quoteText: I grew up cursing a lot.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: I like sitting and writing with my buddies.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: My father used to wear the same pants for like a week.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: Doing Saturday Night Live definitely affects my relationship with my girlfriend and with my family, because you feel so much pressure to do well that night. But I think everyone's grown to accept that and so they give me my space at the show.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: My grandmother used to embarrass me more, when she would pick me up from school wearing a big fuzzy hat. I didn't like that.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: I've always had lots of friends and my house was the house they all hung out at.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: Feels good to try, but playing a father, I'm getting a little older. I see now that I'm taking it more serious and I do want that lifestyle.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: When I was younger and did a stand-up gig, it would take me two weeks to recover. Sometimes I'd get so panicked that I would stutter.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: When I got into this, I never thought about reviews. I never thought about what people would say about me, I was just a young guy who was excited to become a comedian and an actor, and I just wanted to get to do what I got to do.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: My movies just kind of sneak up on you. I don't have to worry too much about what everybody is going to say. Anyway, I really don't pay attention to what the world says about my movies. I just care about what my buddies think.
author: Adam Sandler
